meta.title: Sherry's home
meta.description: Sherry was initially the clone of a goddess. Thanks to some lucky incidents, she gained independence and travelled to a time where she could be free.

quotes: A soft tail a day takes the doctor away.
The most beautiful flower is the one you are holding.
D-do you want to sleep on my tails >.<
Today was a lot of fun ^^
What's this? I-it's for me? （*゜ー゜*）
I'm in a video game? I would love to see it.
